com.fujitsu.xml.xbrl.inlinexbrl.generator
Class InlineXBRLGenerator

java.lang.Object
  com.fujitsu.xml.xbrl.inlinexbrl.generator.InlineXBRLGenerator

public class InlineXBRLGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides the functionality to generate Inline XBRL 1.0 documents.

This class generates Inline XBRL 1.0 DOM documents from an instance document, XHTML DOM documents, and a list of mappings between a fact/footnote in the instance document and XHTML DOM nodes.

For the relationship between mappings and output Inline XBRL 1.0 elements, please refer to the documents of NonFractionMapping, NonNumericMapping, and FootnoteMapping.

The other Inline XBRL 1.0 elements will be output according to the following rules:

  • A div element which has a style attribute with the value display:none will be output as a last child of the body element. An ix:header element and its descendant elements will be output under the div element.
  • Facts(except fractional type) and footnotes that are not specified in the mappings will be contained as ix:nonNumeric, ix:nonFraction, or ix:footnote elements in the ix:hidden element under the ix:header element.
  • All of the tuples included in the instance document will be contained as ix:tuple elements in the ix:hidden element under the ix:header element.
  • References to the schemas and linkbases referred from the instance document will be contained in the ix:references element under the ix:header element.
  • All of the contexts and units included in the instance document will be contained in the ix:resources element under the ix:header element.

Please refer to this page for the sample program using this API.

All methods of this class are not synchronized. It is recommended to create separated processor instances for each thread. If multiple threads access a processor instance concurrently, it must be synchronized externally.

Method Detail

generateInlineXBRL

public org.w3c.dom.Document generateInlineXBRL(com.fujitsu.xml.xbrl.xwand.instance.Instance instance,
                                               org.w3c.dom.Document xhtmlDoc,
                                               InlineXBRLMapping[] mappings)
                                        throws InlineXBRLGeneratorException
Generates an Inline XBRL 1.0 document from the specified instance document, XHTML document, and list of mappings.

Parameters:
instance - instance document
xhtmlDoc - XHTML DOM document
mappings - array of mappings
Returns:
a DOM document of the result Inline XBRL 1.0
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - Thrown if instance, xhtmlDoc, or mappings is null.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if an empty array is specified for the mappings argument.
InlineXBRLGeneratorException -
Thrown if one of the conditions below applies.
  • There was a fatal error during processing
  • User-supplied error handler has thrown an exception
  • There was a internal error during processing

generateInlineXBRL

public org.w3c.dom.Document[] generateInlineXBRL(com.fujitsu.xml.xbrl.xwand.instance.Instance instance,
                                                 org.w3c.dom.Document[] xhtmlDocs,
                                                 InlineXBRLMapping[] mappings)
                                          throws InlineXBRLGeneratorException
Generates Inline XBRL 1.0 documents from the specified instance document, XHTML documents, and list of mappings. The count of the result instance XBRL documents will be same as the count of the input XHTML documents.

Parameters:
instance - instance document
xhtmlDocs - XHTML DOM documents
mappings - array of mappings
Returns:
a DOM documents array of the result Inline XBRL 1.0
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - Thrown if instance, xhtmlDocs, or mappings is null.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when an empty array is specified in the xhtmlDoc or mappings argument.
InlineXBRLGeneratorException -
Thrown if one of the conditions below applies.
  • There was a fatal error during processing
  • User-supplied error handler has thrown an exception
  • There was a internal error during processing

getErrorHandler

public InlineXBRLGeneratorErrorHandler getErrorHandler()

Returns the error handler that is currently in effect. If no error handler is registered by setErrorHandler(com.fujitsu.xml.xbrl.inlinexbrl.generator.InlineXBRLGeneratorErrorHandler) or setErrorHandler(com.fujitsu.xml.xbrl.inlinexbrl.generator.InlineXBRLGeneratorErrorHandler) is called with null argument, this method returns built-in default handler.

Returns:
error handler

setErrorHandler

public void setErrorHandler(InlineXBRLGeneratorErrorHandler errorHandler)

Sets an error handler. If no error handler is registered with this method or this method is called with null argument, built-in default handler is used. The default handler prints all error logs onto the standard error output.

Parameters:
errorHandler - an error handler

getHeaderElementHandler

public InlineXBRLHeaderElementHandler getHeaderElementHandler()

Returns the handler for controlling the destination of elements under the ix:header element of Inline XBRL 1.0. If no handler is registered by setHeaderElementHandler(com.fujitsu.xml.xbrl.inlinexbrl.generator.InlineXBRLHeaderElementHandler), this method returns null.

Returns:
the handler for controlling the destination of elements under the ix:header element

setHeaderElementHandler

public void setHeaderElementHandler(InlineXBRLHeaderElementHandler headerElementHandler)

Set a handler for controlling the destination of elements under the ix:header element of Inline XBRL 1.0. If no handler is registered, all of those elements will be output into the first Inline XBRL 1.0 document.

Parameters:
headerElementHandler - the handler for controlling the destination of elements under the ix:header element
